Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Cube Name to Load/Unload rule (Separated by Delimiter, Accepts Wild card)

Parameters.Name: pMode
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Load/Unload the cube rule (=Load, the file name should be available in the data directory with the required file name Suffix)

Parameters.Name: pFileName
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Full file name for storing the rule (if empty = cube name.txt)

Parameters.Name: pPath
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Saves the file and the backup of the existing rule in this location. If Null, backup will be saved in Data Directory. Default value Null
